resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104609</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104609</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Celebrating Our Connections Through Water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiern Unserer Anschlüsse Durch Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Célébration de Nos Connexions Par l'Eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comemorando Nossas Conexões Através Da Água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Celebrazione Dei Nostri Collegamenti Attraverso 
Acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εορτασμός των συνδέσεών μας μέσω του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Celebración De Nuestras Conexiones A través Del 
Agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site explains to students how they can collect data about the role of water in celebrations around the world, organize it in a retrieval chart, and use the information to create learning stations for a Water Day Celebration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site erklärt Kursteilnehmern, wie sie Daten
über die Rolle des Wassers in den Feiern um die Welt sammeln, es 
organisieren in einem Wiederherstellung Diagramm, und die 
Informationen verwenden können, um erlernenstationen für eine 
Wasser-Tagesfeier zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site explique aux étudiants comment ils 
peuvent rassembler des données au sujet du rôle de l'eau dans les 
célébrations autour du monde, les organiser dans un diagramme de 
recherche, et employer l'information pour créer les stations d'étude
pour une célébration de jour de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local explica aos estudantes como podem 
coletar dados sobre o papel da água nos celebrations em torno do 
mundo, os organizar em uma carta da recuperação, e usar a 
informação criar estações de aprendizagem para um celebration do 
dia da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo spiega agli allievi come possono 
raccogliere i dati circa il ruolo di acqua nelle celebrazioni intorno 
al mondo, organizzarli in una tabella di ricupero ed usare le 
informazioni per creare le stazioni imparanti per una celebrazione di 
giorno dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή εξηγεί στους σπουδαστές πώς μπορούν 
να συλλέξουν τα στοιχεία για το ρόλο του ύδατος στους εορτασμούς 
σε όλο τον κόσμο, να τα οργανώσουν σε ένα διάγραμμα ανάκτησης, 
και να χρησιμοποιήσουν τις πληροφορίες για να δημιουργήσουν τους 
σταθμούς εκμάθησης για έναν εορτασμό ημέρας ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio explica a los estudiantes cómo pueden 
recoger datos sobre el papel del agua en celebraciones alrededor del 
mundo, ordenarlos en una carta de la extracción, y utilizar la 
información para crear las estaciones que aprenden para una 
celebración del día del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104609</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/celebrating-our-connections-through-water</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
